docs.snippet: Led by Paul Millsap’s 27 points, Atlanta maintained a two-game lead over the Knicks, handing the Nets their first loss at Barclays Center in 16 games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Led by Paul Millsap’s 27 points, Atlanta maintained a two-game lead over the Knicks, handing the Nets their first loss at Barclays Center in 16 games.
docs.abstract: Atlanta Hawks beat Brooklyn Nets, 93-88, maintaining lead over New York Knicks for final playoff berth.

headline.main: Hawks End Nets’ Home Streak and Move Closer to Playoff Berth
headline.print_headline: Knicks Keep Playoff Hopes Alive, but the Nets Do Nothing to Help

docs.snippet: A reliable scorer in the N.B.A., Hudson was a six-time All-Star and named humanitarian of the year in 2003 by an association of retired players....
docs.lead_paragraph: A reliable scorer in the N.B.A., Hudson was a six-time All-Star and named humanitarian of the year in 2003 by an association of retired players.
docs.abstract: Lou Hudson, six-time NBA All-Star who was one of the most reliable scorers in the league in a 13-year career, most of it with the Atlanta Hawks, dies at age 69.

headline.main: ‘Sweet’ Lou Hudson, Jump Shot Master With the Hawks, Dies at 69
